title: League of Legends prefers you to not talk at all besides saying "gl hf" "gg wp" "gj"
body:
First offense, my one and only account, and I only picked up this game because people have said it is the best MOBA right now. Been playing for about 4 months now(?), give or take a month since I only play maybe once a week (twice if I have the time). For anyone that is curious, yes I do have a life, no I'm not living with my parents. I have a full time job and working for my career so games are only a luxury for me and I prefer not to waste my time with a game that is not only filled with children but also punishes you for giving criticism. 

This is probably the only game I've played that punishes you for the smallest of things; the censorship is off the scales. Believe me, I've been around online games for a loooong time, think back to Silkroad Online days when it was actually good and free of botting. I'm going to post my "3 game offense" that landed me a 2 week suspension. Nice job riot, guess I'll be dropping this game which is a shame since the game play is simply phenomenal. Unfortunately the community is filled with nasty people that intentionally throw games to get a reaction. 

I know I know, I'm familiar with the "maybe they are just bad players and are not intentionally feeding." Unless you call running down mid 7 times in less than 5 minutes, afking in the fountain while being a keyboard warrior, and constantly spamming taunt/laugh/jokes next to team mates for the majority of the game is just "bad at the game" then I truly did make the right decision to leave this game. Here is my "offense log", I'm level 20:

Game 1
Plastic Tier 4: i got
Plastic Tier 4: its ok
Plastic Tier 4: how did you not get him
Plastic Tier 4: and?
Plastic Tier 4: you dont have jump lvl 2?
Plastic Tier 4: i do have damage
Plastic Tier 4: i chunked him out
Plastic Tier 4: i bunred his flash
Plastic Tier 4: you dont have jump?
Plastic Tier 4: you picked trist
Plastic Tier 4: but dont get jump lvl 2................
Plastic Tier 4: wow
Plastic Tier 4: gl
Plastic Tier 4: primary escape/engage
Plastic Tier 4: doesnt get
Plastic Tier 4: top and bot are hopeless
Plastic Tier 4: dunno why you're pinging
Plastic Tier 4: you fed
Plastic Tier 4: cant report me for anything
Plastic Tier 4: both of you dont have any team play
Plastic Tier 4: i didnt make any bad plays
Plastic Tier 4: you didnt even get jump lvl 2
Plastic Tier 4: idk why
Plastic Tier 4: that is trist's main engage and escape
Plastic Tier 4: and as shown
Plastic Tier 4: you cost us a kill
Plastic Tier 4: riven feeds rengar 1v1
Plastic Tier 4: so i didnt do anything top lane
Plastic Tier 4: dunno how you're gonna report me for your feeding
Plastic Tier 4: in addition im not gonna lane with someone that doesnt help and doesnt know how to put points into abilities
Plastic Tier 4: even yi asked why you didnt use heal
Plastic Tier 4: all in chat record
Plastic Tier 4: ff
Plastic Tier 4: top and adc dont know what they are doing
Plastic Tier 4: how am i intentional feed when you have double my deaths?
Plastic Tier 4: cant answer huh?
Plastic Tier 4: scores never lie
Plastic Tier 4: i didnt say a single negative thing
Plastic Tier 4: but i didnt say anything negative
Plastic Tier 4: i made an observation
Plastic Tier 4: now you are lying
Plastic Tier 4: scroll back up
Plastic Tier 4: i didnt say a single negative thing
Plastic Tier 4: please point out what i said that is negative
Plastic Tier 4: for lying you will get a report
Plastic Tier 4: gl
Plastic Tier 4: 5 deaths riven
Plastic Tier 4: intentional feed
Plastic Tier 4: gj riven
Plastic Tier 4: says im intentionally feeding
Plastic Tier 4: trist is 0/3/0
Plastic Tier 4: no kill participation
Plastic Tier 4: scores never lie
Plastic Tier 4: gl with report
Plastic Tier 4: doesnt get jump at lvl 2
Plastic Tier 4: i still cant believe it

Game 2
Plastic Tier 4: nice team work
Plastic Tier 4: gj guys
Plastic Tier 4: way to pay attention
Plastic Tier 4: gg
Plastic Tier 4: no one pays attention
Plastic Tier 4: so you pushed ww into me
Plastic Tier 4: you really want to lose huh
Plastic Tier 4: you guys are trolling me
Plastic Tier 4: gl hf
Plastic Tier 4: 0/1/0 jinx
Plastic Tier 4: so you're intentionally feeding
Plastic Tier 4: lux support doing more than adc
Plastic Tier 4: jinx afk
Plastic Tier 4: typical
Plastic Tier 4: feed intentionally then quits
Plastic Tier 4: gl
Plastic Tier 4: i have more kills than an actual adc
Plastic Tier 4: how sad is this
Plastic Tier 4: intentionally feeds and then quits
Plastic Tier 4: now talking
Plastic Tier 4: you run down mid 3 times
Plastic Tier 4: all because i pointed out the fact you dont have more kills than me
Plastic Tier 4: better than you doing nothing
Plastic Tier 4: and you are playing the actual adc role
Plastic Tier 4: so stop afking in fountain

Game 3
Plastic Tier 4: why do you guys keep coming to the lane im in?
Plastic Tier 4: made me get so behind
Plastic Tier 4: no mid cause you screwed me
Plastic Tier 4: by making me go bot
Plastic Tier 4: and taking my cs
Plastic Tier 4: yeah i did
Plastic Tier 4: and i was up 15 cs
Plastic Tier 4: easy
Plastic Tier 4: then you 2 came to my lane and screwed me over
Plastic Tier 4: gl with report
Plastic Tier 4: bot lane screwed me so hard
Plastic Tier 4: no
Plastic Tier 4: bot lane took over my lane
Plastic Tier 4: and took all my cs
Plastic Tier 4: no
Plastic Tier 4: YOU made it hard
Plastic Tier 4: you died to jax
Plastic Tier 4: in his jungle
Plastic Tier 4: you snowballed him
Plastic Tier 4: you tried to solo invade with no wards
Plastic Tier 4: and died for it
Plastic Tier 4: gj eve
Plastic Tier 4: says the eve that fed my lane
Plastic Tier 4: you ran into morg 3 times
Plastic Tier 4: eve your autolock lost us the game
Plastic Tier 4: dont play a role you're not familiar with
Plastic Tier 4: you, kog, and ali can enjoy your report
Plastic Tier 4: gl
Plastic Tier 4: gg wp
Plastic Tier 4: you're welcome that eve trolled
Plastic Tier 4: auto lock
Plastic Tier 4: amumu i hope you get this ali and eve next game
Plastic Tier 4: then I get to see you complain

Go ahead, call me an idiot, bitch, retard, anything you want for typing "ff" and "gl with report" multiple times. I'm familiar with the terms & agreement and am fully aware you **can** be punished for saying those 2 phrases specifically, however, **it is not an automatic offense**, something that most people fail to understand. From what I read from in the past, people who have been pardoned from punishment _even though they broke the terms & agreement_ were pardoned due to being provoked. I guess riot doesn't care anymore and punishes regardless? Someone can enlighten me on that.

But yes, 2 week ban and this is my one and only offense. Call this a rant or me being a whiny little bitch, I can take it xD This is more of a record for myself and reference for anyone that is curious how Riot handles censorship. As my title suggest, from this "offense" alone, I think it's safe to say the only way to skirt by the system without landing a punishment is to say as little as possible and must be positive connotation. Must not be able to be interpreted negatively so I'd stay away from neutral statements, too much of a risk. The only things I recommend people new to this game to say are "good game well played (gg wp)" "good luck have fun (gl hf)" "good job (gj)" "nice" and calling out summoner spells/objectives such as "Janna flash (janna f)" "Malphite teleport (malph t)" "dragon up in 1m" etc.

Well, I wish everyone luck with this game. It's unfortunate how negative the community is, but even more so, tragic how censored the game has become. Onwards to Overwatch for me.

replies.body:
The punishment system works based off the percentage of reports you gets.

You're right, absolutely everyone has been toxic in at least one game. But you need to be consistently negative, getting reported in at least half your games,  to get a punishment. 

If you don't want to reform your behavior and try to be respectful in game, go ahead, stop playing. We don't need that kind of negativity in our games.

What kind of negativity, please point it out in the 3 games posted line by line and explain each line. After you explain, please elaborate on why it is a 2 week suspension especially since this is a first offense. If a rioter on this forum would like to confirm that, be my guest I have nothing to hide. In addition, according to what you just said "we don't need that kind of negativity in our games" and "absolutely everyone has been toxic in at least one game" then everyone should be punished. There is no indication and no information that backs up your statement of "getting reported in at least half your games, to get punishment." Please provide a link for your source. If you can't provide a link then you are displaying negativity by falsely accusing me of "displaying negative behavior" in "at least half" of my games. An easily reportable offense according to the Terms & Agreement. I'm glad to leave if this is the hositlity that I suspected, thank you for confirming that.

There's a support article about the Instant Feedback system. Sorry for not linking it earlier, I sometimes forget people have no reason to believe me.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286

From the first sentence, "The League of Legends community is empowered to report players they believe have violated the Summoner's Code and **consistently** created a negative experience in games."

50% is a guessed minimum. Riot will never tell us the exact % of reports you need to get punished, because they don't want players gaming the report system. The end goal is to eradicate toxicity, not have it in only a certain % of games. Considering only 5% of the population ever get so much as a chat restriction, it is safe to say that number is quite high.

Anyway, as the support article says, you can be escalated to a 2 week ban if you're particularly offensive. Which happened in this case. I think you know very well what's toxic about what you said, but to give a clean definition: If the intention of the line of chat was to harass, coerce, threaten, or mock any player, it was against the summoner's code. 

I think it's worth saying, reforming isn't that difficult once you get used to it. You do have the general idea: keep communication neutral or positive, and you'll be fine. If you like the game, you totally should try to be less inflammatory. Just like the community doesn't need negativity, it needs good community members too.

Thank you very much for the reply and I greatly appreciate the linked source. I find it disturbing how censored this game is if what I surmised is true (which you have just confirmed as well with the whole neutral/positive communication). Does this censorship not bother you? I fail to understand how my words in those 3 games were displaying negative behavior and deserved a 2 week ban, however, if my definition of negative behavior is not the same as riot's then it's possible I'll commit the same mistakes in the future without even realizing. Perhaps my decision to leave is the right one then?

Just to give more information, no I do not know anything about how I was toxic since I had no intention of provocation or harassment. I merely pointed out what happened, for example, the trist that I was supporting had initiated an all in on the enemy adc and I collapsed on her. While trist was preoccupied with the enemy support I managed to chunk out the enemy adc down to 23 hp. Trist had more than half hp (I forgot exact amount sorry) and continued to attack the enemy support instead of the adc (trist was right next to her no more than 3 creeps away). Enemy adc flashed away and I turned my eyes to trist waiting for her to jump to get the kill. Absolutely nothing... thus I made note of it and I was met with "stfu idiot" and a slew of keyboard-warrior esque lines.

That's just one example but if you can please explain to me how I was toxic and why this chat log = 2 week ban. This is a first offense and I'm only lvl 20. If you truly believe that riot was right in giving me this 2 week ban then I'm definitely leaving this game for good. No sane person would stay and leash themselves to "reform" (hardly reformation, just censoring); that's just masochistic. The first line of yoru last paragraph concerns me, "reforming isn't that difficult once you get used to it." That alone should scream red flag, by definition that is conditioning. I don't know what it means to be "less inflammatory" which is why I keep asking people on this thread what I did wrong. This is how I am in every other game that I've played and yet this is the only game to not only be punished for it, but to be given a **harsh** punishment (imo).

Yes, the ban was just. Like I said, anything said with the intention to mock, threaten, coerce, or insult a teammate is against the summoner's code.

Honestly, 90% of what you said violated that. Trist is bad, Eve is bad, Bot screwed me, mid screwed me, team doesn't pay attention, you're a feeder, etc etc.

When somebody messes up or you don't like how the game is going, keep it to yourself man.

Well according to riot it wasn't just:
http://imgur.com/oKMvTXY

I brought the problem up with a ticket at their support site and they replied--rather swiftly I may add--with apologies. They reverted the punishment to a 9 game chat restriction which I found fair considering how G rated this game is and my unknowing of this critical piece of information.

As I thought, you and many others like you that thought this 2 week suspension was just simply do not know what you're talking about. I knew but I still made this thread to confirm my speculation and have it on record, for that I apologize for using you. Perhaps this case will broaden your thinking and many others who have said I "deserved" it. Regardless of the reduction in punishment and extensive apologies I'm dropping this game at least for a while. Other than the handful of people that are rationale, the majority of you that make up the LoL community are just horrible confirming the rumors that LoL has a "toxic" community. You're glad to have me leave and I'm glad not to taint and degrade myself. Win win! Enjoy your muzzle.

Editing this to a more constructive post:

Instead of not knowing what we're talking about, we don't know about your specific situation. We don't know if you're lying. We don't know if you excluded things. We don't know your account history. Riot does though. We do tend to side with Riot, because in our experience Riot usually doesn't make mistakes. Error rate is very small. You're a minority, and that's not our fault.

It's unlikely a Rioter will come along and look at it, so we have to make assumptions. Overall, if you can't see what's wrong with what you posted after having it explained to you, there's not much we can do to help.

Very true, with that said I can only ask you to wait for a Rioter to confirm the case I displayed if any rioter would even want to. I leave this here as record and take note of your query. Nothing I can do about your skepticism. However, it is your fault as well as others that would report people for what you see here. Are you proud of yourself for getting offended over such a small thing and getting someones account ruined? If so, the game is meant for people that are sadists.
Am I proud for reporting toxicity that ruins games? Yeah. Yeah I am.
Thank you for proving my point =]

Addendum: After writing that reply, I can kind of see how you would come to the conclusion that [telling you to keep feelings to yourself] is censorship. The difference between this and censorship, however, is the intention. Censorship is committed to protect an agenda, policy, or regime. The purpose of the summoner's code is to keep the game fun for the other people in the game. Even if you're not having a good time, you can't ruin anyone else's good time. That's a basic premise of the rules.
Having a muzzle on you is fun? I'm asking sincerely since I don't know how that feels like and probably never will.

I'm not saying it's necessarily fun for you, but it's respectful to the other players. It's sort of like not talking during a boring movie. Ideally, you're going to develop better emotional control, so you don't feel like raging at your team anyway.

You're comparing a movie to a video game... what???? Do I need to explain how nonsensical that is? And just a side note, people DO talk during movies, especially if it's boring. You need to broaden your experience.
Yea and those guys are assholes. /shrug That's what DVDs are for.
You just proved the riot system is bad without even knowing.

As requested, because maybe you honestly need it, I went over every line and explained how what you said got you reported, and your 14 day ban.


> [{quoted}](name=Plastic Tier 4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5b77qvs3,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-15T00:44:10.585+0000)
> Game 1
> Plastic Tier 4: i got
> Plastic Tier 4: its ok
> Plastic Tier 4: how did you not get him
> Plastic Tier 4: and?
> Plastic Tier 4: you dont have jump lvl 2?
> Plastic Tier 4: i do have damage
> Plastic Tier 4: i chunked him out
> Plastic Tier 4: i bunred his flash
> Plastic Tier 4: you dont have jump?
> Plastic Tier 4: you picked trist
> Plastic Tier 4: but dont get jump lvl 2................
> Plastic Tier 4: wow
> Plastic Tier 4: gl
> Plastic Tier 4: primary escape/engage
> Plastic Tier 4: doesnt get

Basically you're calling the Trist player bad at the game and with their champion for not securing a kill, and not building how you want them to. Maybe they misclicked when leveling and chose the wrong skill? Maybe they're just trying out a different build path to see how it is?

> Plastic Tier 4: top and bot are hopeless

Calling 3 players hopeless. I think this is pretty self explanatory.

> Plastic Tier 4: dunno why you&#039;re pinging
> Plastic Tier 4: you fed

They're pinging you because they were trying to communicate with you without typing, since pinging is faster. Pointing out that they fed isn't helping anyone.

> Plastic Tier 4: cant report me for anything

Apparently they can. And did. Well played.

> Plastic Tier 4: both of you dont have any team play

Again, just trying to point out how your team mates are bad at the game.

> Plastic Tier 4: i didnt make any bad plays

Of course not. 

> Plastic Tier 4: you didnt even get jump lvl 2
> Plastic Tier 4: idk why
> Plastic Tier 4: that is trist&#039;s main engage and escape
> Plastic Tier 4: and as shown
> Plastic Tier 4: you cost us a kill

Losing out on one kill isn't a big deal, especially in the early game after the xp changes. Not everyone is as perfect as you, and might make a mistake.

> Plastic Tier 4: riven feeds rengar 1v1
> Plastic Tier 4: so i didnt do anything top lane

Pointing out how a player messed up repeatedly isn't going to help anything but make them feel worse.

> Plastic Tier 4: dunno how you&#039;re gonna report me for your feeding
> Plastic Tier 4: in addition im not gonna lane with someone that doesnt help and doesnt know how to put points into abilities
> Plastic Tier 4: even yi asked why you didnt use heal
> Plastic Tier 4: all in chat record
> Plastic Tier 4: ff
> Plastic Tier 4: top and adc dont know what they are doing

Again, calling them bad and blatantly saying you're not going to play with your team.


> Plastic Tier 4: how am i intentional feed when you have double my deaths?
> Plastic Tier 4: cant answer huh?
> Plastic Tier 4: scores never lie

You can easily intentionally feed but have less deaths than someone. If someone has a bad game and makes a lot of mistakes, they might die a lot. How many times they die doesn't effect whether or not you run into a turret and suicide. 

> Plastic Tier 4: i didnt say a single negative thing
> Plastic Tier 4: but i didnt say anything negative

literally almost everything you've said has been negative up til now.

> Plastic Tier 4: i made an observation

being a passive aggressive asshole that calls your teammates bad isn't "making an observation".

> Plastic Tier 4: now you are lying
> Plastic Tier 4: scroll back up
> Plastic Tier 4: i didnt say a single negative thing
> Plastic Tier 4: please point out what i said that is negative
> Plastic Tier 4: for lying you will get a report
> Plastic Tier 4: gl
> Plastic Tier 4: 5 deaths riven
> Plastic Tier 4: intentional feed
> Plastic Tier 4: gj riven
> Plastic Tier 4: says im intentionally feeding
> Plastic Tier 4: trist is 0/3/0
> Plastic Tier 4: no kill participation
> Plastic Tier 4: scores never lie
> Plastic Tier 4: gl with report
> Plastic Tier 4: doesnt get jump at lvl 2
> Plastic Tier 4: i still cant believe it

Just dwelling on the same mistakes and talking shit about your team mates. How you can't see this is negative is beyond me.

> 
> Game 2
> Plastic Tier 4: nice team work
> Plastic Tier 4: gj guys
> Plastic Tier 4: way to pay attention
> Plastic Tier 4: gg
> Plastic Tier 4: no one pays attention

Being a sarcastic, passive aggressive person might be seen as negative to some. Not to you though apparently.

> Plastic Tier 4: so you pushed ww into me
> Plastic Tier 4: you really want to lose huh
> Plastic Tier 4: you guys are trolling me
> Plastic Tier 4: gl hf

Basically saying you're not going to cooperate with your team, and blaming them for throwing the game.

> Plastic Tier 4: 0/1/0 jinx
> Plastic Tier 4: so you&#039;re intentionally feeding

1 death and you're already going off on them. nice.

> Plastic Tier 4: lux support doing more than adc

lux support does damage. Sometimes a support player will secure a kill. Yet somehow you try to turn a player helping your team into a weapon to attack the jinx. 

> Plastic Tier 4: jinx afk
> Plastic Tier 4: typical
> Plastic Tier 4: feed intentionally then quits
> Plastic Tier 4: gl

They should have just muted you, but they were probably done playing with you since you tilted them so much.

> Plastic Tier 4: i have more kills than an actual adc
> Plastic Tier 4: how sad is this

I'm not sure what that's supposed to even mean. Yes, other players can have more kills than someone. 

> Plastic Tier 4: intentionally feeds and then quits
> Plastic Tier 4: now talking
> Plastic Tier 4: you run down mid 3 times
> Plastic Tier 4: all because i pointed out the fact you dont have more kills than me
> Plastic Tier 4: better than you doing nothing
> Plastic Tier 4: and you are playing the actual adc role

This seems to be a pattern of you "just making observations" that are actually you trying to trash talk your team while making yourself out to be a great player. 

> Plastic Tier 4: so stop afking in fountain

At this point I'm going to assume them afking at the fountain was actually just deciding what item to build next if they did it repeatedly. 

> 
> Game 3
> Plastic Tier 4: why do you guys keep coming to the lane im in?
> Plastic Tier 4: made me get so behind

No they didn't. You did. Don't blame others for you playing poorly and getting behind. 

> Plastic Tier 4: no mid cause you screwed me
> Plastic Tier 4: by making me go bot

Someone made you do something in game? Or did you choose to go bot lane? Again, stop blaming others for your actions.

> Plastic Tier 4: and taking my cs
> Plastic Tier 4: yeah i did
> Plastic Tier 4: and i was up 15 cs
> Plastic Tier 4: easy
> Plastic Tier 4: then you 2 came to my lane and screwed me over

Not having seen the game, I'm not sure what happened. My guess is the enemy jg was ganking your lane and they came to help, they thought they could gank your lane and help you, or they were chasing someone who ran to your lane.

> Plastic Tier 4: gl with report
> Plastic Tier 4: bot lane screwed me so hard

No they didn't. 

> Plastic Tier 4: no
> Plastic Tier 4: bot lane took over my lane
> Plastic Tier 4: and took all my cs

Again, having not seen the game, I can say for sure what happened here. I'm going to guess you exaggerated and bot came to try to help you, not intentionally steal your cs and throw the game.

> Plastic Tier 4: no
> Plastic Tier 4: YOU made it hard
> Plastic Tier 4: you died to jax
> Plastic Tier 4: in his jungle
> Plastic Tier 4: you snowballed him

They tried to counter jungle and it didn't go as they hoped. 

> Plastic Tier 4: you tried to solo invade with no wards
> Plastic Tier 4: and died for it
> Plastic Tier 4: gj eve

Bad decision making sucks. No need to passive aggressively point out how they fucked up. another way you could have said this, if you wanted to say anything at all, is "you should wait until we have vision on the enemy jg before you counter jungle in the future." Or something along those lines. Actually give constructive criticism and advice on how to improve if you feel the need to say anything rather than just calling them out.

> Plastic Tier 4: says the eve that fed my lane
> Plastic Tier 4: you ran into morg 3 times
> Plastic Tier 4: eve your autolock lost us the game

It didn't. They made some bad plays, but they hardly lost the game. Rather than blame them, ask yourself "how could I have done this better?" It's possible to win games even when behind in lane. 

> Plastic Tier 4: dont play a role you&#039;re not familiar with

How do you want them to ever get familiar with a role if they don't play it? 

> Plastic Tier 4: you, kog, and ali can enjoy your report

For what, exactly? Having a bad game? Read what each report is actually for.

> Plastic Tier 4: gl
> Plastic Tier 4: gg wp
> Plastic Tier 4: you&#039;re welcome that eve trolled
> Plastic Tier 4: auto lock

Again, calling out your team mates. It's not helping anyone and only serves to make them feel worse.


I hope this helps you realize how the things you say are rude or toxic. Maybe you can work on improving your attitude in game, and being more positive in the future, or just not saying anything at all if you want to say something negative. Check out Sky Williams video on how positivity can help you win games. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cz7TWpRXyRY

> [{quoted}](name=Plastic Tier 4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5b77qvs3,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-07-14T23:21:31.984+0000)

> It's unfortunate how negative the community is

was my favorite line. Farewell, have fun ruining the overwatch community. You won't be missed.

Responding to the title because I'm not reading this giant wall of text.

You are wrong. I chat all the time. What I don't do is rage at people or insult them.
Classic reply, I expected no less of a prepubescent teen. You've merely confirmed why this punishment does not make any sense. Thank you. Ironic how you say I'm wrong but you prove me right.

> [{quoted}](name=Plastic Tier 4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5b77qvs3,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-07-15T00:23:04.190+0000)
>
> Classic reply, I expected no less of a prepubescent teen. You've merely confirmed why this punishment does not make any sense. Thank you. Ironic how you say I'm wrong but you prove me right.

Funny story, I WORK with prepubescent teens (5th and 6th graders). They can tell you what's wrong with your chat logs. Doesn't it bother you at least a little that you know less about etiquette than 5th graders? 

No, then again it probably doesn't.

Enjoy your ban!
Since you seem to know more, please point out which lines are below etiquette, why it is below etiguette, and your source of information for your explanation.

> [{quoted}](name=Plastic Tier 4,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=5b77qvs3,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-15T01:29:49.019+0000)
>
> Since you seem to know more, please point out which lines are below etiquette, why it is below etiguette, and your source of information for your explanation.

My time would be better spent scratching myself, to be honest... At any rate I see dynikus above has already made such an exercise. 

You now have a decision to make. You know you can get your account suspended for this kind of chat. You can either change how you act, or you can lose your account. Ball is in your court.

Np, I didn't think you had anything anyways. Thank you for confirming that :D Enjoy the game! Also, thank you for proving to be yet another ignorant player. Riot made a mistake and reverted my suspension once I brought it up via a support ticket. They apologized profusely and instead gave me a 9 game chat restriction which I find fair for a G rated game.
http://imgur.com/oKMvTXY

Anything to say about that?

They still punished you, which proves that your behavior was uncalled for.  If you continue to act this way, the punishments will build up in significance.  Everything AraMoOse said is still relevant to your situation.
This kind of talk... right here.... you should be banned. I hope you do uninstall. People like you a huge part of what detracts from the League experience.

Tell me your age then to confirm my statement. It's not an insult if it's true, I merely made an observation. I'm 24 living with my fiance. You? Why are you "gamers" so easily offended? I find it strange and concerning to find such an over reaction to "prepubescent teen" which isn't even an insult; it's an age group pertaining to ages 12-17. Seriously banned for that? Wow thank you for that insight. Enjoy your G rated game.

28 years old. been at my job for 5 years. just bought a new car cash. Live with my girlfriend for years now. And your entire game log chat is needlessly toxic. You're below bronze. Quit telling your team mates what they're doing wrong and enjoy the game. I could go to your elo right now and carry 9/10 games. It's not about your team mates. YOU are the common denominator in all your games. People afk because you harass them until they'd rather turn the game off than listen to any more shit from you. I guarantee toxicity and AFK's get reduced by 80% or more if you don't say a word all game, or, God forbid, maintain a positive attitude, even through getting stomped.

You've just displayed toxic behavior which is exactly what I made note of in my original post. Riot has a 4 tiered punishment system. You start with 10 and 25 game chat bans. Then you progress to a 14 day suspension. And if you still haven't shown any signs of reforming then the final punishment is a permanent account suspension. In some cases accounts will be escalated and skip past the chat bans going straight to a suspension.

The purpose for this system is to help Riot establish player behaviour patterns. Just because an account moves up to another punishment tier doesn't necessary mean that the behaviour demonstrated was equal to the punishment. It means that the account has received enough reports and consistently been found to have toxic behaviour the violates the TOS. 

Riot generally gives the player several chances to change the behaviour and if no change is seen then the account gets more severe punishments. In some cases an account is automatically given a 14 day suspension for cases of extremely toxic behaviour such as racism, sexism, and threats.

The Chat logs that you are sent do not contain every example that lead to your suspension. They are just three logs that are randomly selected. If you received a punishment then there is absolutely more then just these chat logs.
You were rude and crude to your team with your constant harassment of them... Plain and simple.
Please point out which lines were harassment and explain each line. Then can you elaborate on why that is a 2 week suspension on a first offense along with your source of information.

I want to call bullshit on not getting chat restrictions. You don't go straight to a 14 day ban unless you used some serious language in your chat. Examples: Homophobic slurs, irl death threats, racial slurs, and stuff like that.

The only other way to get bumped up to a 14 day ban would be from trolling players or intentionally feeding in your games.

Game 1
That's hilarious that you are constantly berating someone for not getting jump on Trist level 2 when the highest win rate in plat+ gets jump at level 3 (http://champion.gg/champion/Tristana/ADC.)  Honestly its a judgement call depending on how the laning phase is going and you really shouldn't have been that much of an ass about it.  The fact that you bring it up over and over and over doesn't do anyone any good.  The only reason you did it was to piss your allies off.  You really shouldn't be flaming people regarding optimal builds/abilities/runes/masteries because you've only been playing the game a couple months and still don't know that much about the game.  Instead of berating the Trist for not having jump you should have been telling your jungler that bot lane doesn't have flash and they are an easy gank.  Then you could have picked up a pink ward to make sure they didn't ward river and guarantee a double kill when their bot lane pushed up (which they would do since everyone mindlessly pushes lanes.)

Game 2
Berating people for not paying attention.  No real point to do it.  Did you even ping them?
Saying someone is "intentionally feeding" when they are 0/1/0 is pretty absurd.  
It is not uncommon for a support lux to do better than the ADC, especially in the early game.  If you had some decent game knowledge you would know that.  The whole reason why ADC's need supports early game is they are really fragile early game but scale incredibly well.  This is especially true on late game carries like Jinx and Tristana.

Game 3
Why did bot lane come mid?  Did they take their tower?  If so then that is the right call.  They should come mid after taking their tower to knock down mid tower so you can snowball the gold lead.  Tower gold is much, much more than a few CS.
Invading as Eve is usually a good idea level 2 (or later.)  A decent amount of the time she can pick up first blood and really put their jungler behind.  So what if she messed up?  You're playing in NORMAL games the whole point of NORMAL games is to learn champions.  People are going to mess up and do stupid stuff.  If you can't just laugh it off and have fun then you should quit now.  How'd you like it if I berated you anytime you tried a new champ or made a mistake?

Closing thoughts
You are new to this game.  You need to accept the fact that you don't know everything about the game.  Since you don't know everything about the game you shouldn't berate people for making questionable choices.  Most of the stuff you raged at people over were perfectly reasonable calls.  No decision in league is 100% right 100% of the time.  Just because someone makes a call and it doesn't work out doesn't mean it wasn't the right call.  Sometimes its worth the risk if the reward is great enough.

Honestly you need to just chill out.  You're acting like you're diamond when you are brand new to the game  Nothing you said was of value to your team.  It was just you whining and complaining.  What would you do if someone at work never contributed anything positive to the discussion and just whined and complained all the time.  You'd probably ostracize that bastard and if you were his boss you'd look for an excuse to fire him.  That's what league is doing to you now.  Unless you have something useful or productive to say then you shouldn't type anything at all.  If you were in my games I would have muted you and reported you.  Not because you "hurt my feelings" or because "I'm a child" (actually I'm 30) but because you're acting like an ass and I really don't like putting up with that.  Video games are a luxury for me too.  I deal with enough assholes in real life, I don't need them when I'm trying to relax and play video games as well.

ITS A FREAKING GAME.  Laugh and have fun.  If your allies do stupid stuff laugh it off or give them useful advice rather than just berating them.  If you can't do that then find a new game to play.
You're so toxic that you're even delusional enough to not see it
